title: The Claiming of Af, the Angel of Light
description: This is a very erotic story of the claiming of Af, an innocent Angel of Light who falls into sinful and lustful darkness as a result of her journeys through the Realm of the Fairee. Af encounters several very masterful and horny beings who take control of her sweet and innocent angel body and force her to submit to unending waves of sexual pleasure. This is an explicit sex story with elements of dubious consent, facials, sleep/unconscious sex, dominant male, submissive female, monster sex, spanking, BDSM, erotica, and hypnosis/trance sex.
author: Bella Swann
